title: Technology Coverage Expansion - Phase 1-3
description:
Expanded technology coverage for Loki patterns and dashboard templates across 3 phases:

Phase 1 (MySQL, RabbitMQ, Nginx):
- MySQL: 7 Loki patterns + dashboard template
- RabbitMQ: 7 Loki patterns + 6 dashboard panels
- Nginx: 7 Loki patterns + 6 dashboard panels

Phase 2 (NATS, Pulsar):
- NATS: 5 Loki patterns + 5 dashboard panels
- Pulsar: 5 Loki patterns + 5 dashboard panels

Phase 3 (HAProxy, Traefik, etcd, Consul):
- HAProxy: 5 Loki patterns + 6 dashboard panels
- Traefik: 5 Loki patterns + 5 dashboard panels
- etcd: 5 Loki patterns + 5 dashboard panels
- Consul: 5 Loki patterns + 5 dashboard panels

Final coverage:
- Loki patterns: 15 technologies (was 6)
- Dashboard templates: 18 technologies (was 9)

Commits: e911a6f, 670f3e6
